summary: Rejected as an immigrant because he doesn't have the required $200, a Czech immigrant jumps ship and is befriended by a chorus girl and becomes a taxi driver.
cast: Francis Lederer|Ginger Rogers|Arthur Hohl|Jimmy Butler|J. Farrell MacDonald|Helen Ware|Eily Malyon|Lillian Harmer|Donald Meek|Sidney Toler|Oscar Apfel|Reginald Barlow|Carmen Gould|Richard Alexander|Irving Bacon|Wade Boteler|A.S. 'Pop' Byron|Spencer Charters|Martin Cichy|Andy Clyde|Dick Curtis|James Donlan|Billy Dooley|Harold Goodwin|Ben Hendricks Jr.|Paul Hurst|Edward LeSaint|Jack Pennick|Christian Rub|Frank Sheridan|Landers Stevens|Ben Taggart|Max Wagner
title: El embrujo de Manhattan
